mapper.select: select id, name, code, pages, create_time, status, src from books where status in (0,2) and tag like '%無修正%'
mapper.insert: insert into books_error (id, name, code, pages, create_time, status, src) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pages,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{src,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into books (id, name, code, pages, create_time, status,src) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pages,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.src,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into books (id, name, code, pages, create_time, status, src, tag, writer, language, type) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pages,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{src,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update books set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pages = #{pages,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, src = #{src,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tag = #{tag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, writer = #{writer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, language = #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, code, pages, create_time, status, src, tag, writer, language, type from books WHERE tag is null
